name: Guides for WordPress and Woocommerce
author: DCS Digital

sections.description:
DCS Digital Guides understand what you’re trying to do in the WordPress admin and shows a small, subtle “Watch guide” at the bottom of the page.

When you click on this, it will show a video tutorial on how best to use the functionality available.

We’ll share our best practices, tips and other useful information to help you make the most of WordPress, Woocommerce and other popular plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Add the dcs-digital-guides folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Are guides available for every feature?

Not yet – but we’re working on adding tutorials on a regular basis.

Can I disable guides?

Currently guides show to all users. We have plans in the future to allow individuals to hide and show guides as they learn.

short_description: Get video tutorials and guides when you need them, from within the WordPress admin area.
